original: siddhee ae ka b'i ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: siddhee ae ka b ra sa dha nam

original: dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dpa bo gcig tu grub ba sgrub thabs

original: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: sngar chad ba cho gas stong ba nyid sgom ba rjes la

original: padma dkar po'i steng du yi ge a'a: dkar po las byung ba'i zla ba la yi ge dh'i: dkar po yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: padma dkar po steng du yi ge aa: dkar po las byung ba zla ba la yi ge dh: dkar po yongs su gyur ba las rje btsun jam dpal dpa bo gcig tu grub ba zhes byed ba

original: sku mdog thams cad dkar ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: sku mdog thams cad dkar ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba

original: g-yon pas autpala sngon po bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon ba autpala sngon po snom ba

original: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang ldan zhing mdzes pa /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang ldan zhing mdzes ba

original: rnam par bkra pa'i na bza' bsnams nas skyil krung gis bzhugs par bdag nyid skad cig gis rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: rnam ba bkra ba na bza snom nas skyil krung gis bzhugs ba bdag nyid skad cig gis rdzogs ba byed la

original: mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang / snying ga rnams su yi ge aom a'a: h'um rnams dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: mgo bo dang mgrin ba dang snying ga rnams su yi ge aom aa: hum rnams god ba byed

original: a'a:'i yi ge dang h'um gi gnyis kyi bar du yang yi ge dh'i:'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi don byed par gyur pas gsang sngags bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: aa: yi ge dang hum gi gnyis kyi ba du yang yi ge dh: d zer gyis jig rten gyi don byed ba gyur ba gsang sngags bzlas ba byed ste

original: aom rdo rje rnon pos sdug bsngal gcod //
analyzed: aom rdo rje rnon pos sdug sngal gcod

original: shes rab ye shes dag gi sku //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes dag gi sku

original: ye shes sku ste gsung dbang phyug / aa ra pa tsa na dbang 'dud //
analyzed: ye shes sku ste gsung dbang phyug aa ra ba tsa na dbang dud

original: dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: dpa bo gcig tu grub ba sgrub thabs so

original: mkhas pa aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: mkhas ba aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis sgyur
